thread.title: Use the force to wash with new Star Wars shower heads
thread.title_full: Use the force to wash with new Star Wars shower heads | www.daytondailynews.com

author: Nelson Hicks
title: Use the force to wash with new Star Wars shower heads
text:
In case you didn’t quite have enough Star Wars memorabilia in every corner of your home, you can now check off your shower with all new force-filled shower heads .
The shower heads come in either Darth Vader or R2-D2 versions with three different settings and anti-clog nozzles.
>> Read more trending stories
The Sith lord will cost you five dollars more than your favorite robot buddy, $30 to $25 respectively .
So have fun bathing underneath Vader’s tears, though commenters are already agreeing that the shower head is just a tad too creepy for their taste.
